attributes.action: Withdraw the invitation to the American President Donald Trump to visit the U.K.
attributes.additional_details:
i) 27th January 2017 Executive order headed PROTECTING THE NATION FROM FOREIGN TERRORIST ENTRY INTO THE UNITED 
ii) 25th January 2017 Executive order headed BORDER SECURITY AND IMMIGRATION ENFORCEMENT IMPROVEMENTS
attributes.background: President Trump's policies and attitudes are racist, misogynistic, xenophobic and environmentally damaging, with one of his immigration orders being criticised by two UN agencies. Until these policies are reversed, he should be treated as 'persona non grata' by the UK.
